channel.title: ::Pnpc/::Npc Command Codes
channel.description:
Hi, I'm an admin on 2 servers, and I've found a database for every item code, but not one for every npc code. I'd love to be the arzinian being of bordanzan, or perhaps one of the barrows brothers, or maybe even one of the 4 guys from desert treasure. There's only one thing I would love more.
If someone could get me an npc code guide, so I could be all of the above, and the rest. Also, if someone tells me how to do rep, I'll rep you once, and the person who gets me the npc code guide TWICE.

item.title: ::Pnpc/::Npc Command Codes
item.dc:creator: @one_uglybird one uglybird
item.description:
@one_uglybird wrote:

For 3 rep points, how do I rep you?

Read full topic
